website_summaries.verdict: Active bamboo charcoal and white China clay in this iconic mask absorbs impurities and toxins while sloughing off old cells, pollution, and makeup, leaving skin clearer.
pros: Many blackhead sufferers were amazed to visibly see results as the mask hardens and tightens up
It doesn’t overdry the skin, and leaves it fresh and clear, with large pores visibly smaller
It even gives mature skin a deep clean glow
cons: This is best used once a week for stubborn blackheads
It did cause redness for some users

customer_reviews.title: I received the product without manufacture box. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product without manufacture box. It was wrapped in the tape with weird label. The product image doesn't match the one that I saw on the site. I am definitely returning it. Im not taking a chance to try something on my face that doesn't look original.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the product if it’s not sealed!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this face mask, as it really helps keep my skin clear and reduces my breakouts if used regularly, but the product I received had no seal and smelled strongly of bleach. Seemed highly suspicious. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: MsMaisel

customer_reviews.title: I am confused by the ratings this product received. ...
customer_reviews.text: I am confused by the ratings this product received. I used according to their directions and saw zero results. It did not do anything for clogged pores or small black heads. It warms that it may dry your skin. I normally have rather oily skin; the warning is an understatement. It took several days to moisturize my skin so that it felt normal again. I had my friend try it, she also had no visible results and had the same issues with dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth face!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today...OMG my skin has never felt SO SOFT AND SMOOTH as it did after doing this mask. I feel like my pores looked cleaner, but it’s only been one use. I will update my review after I have more time with the product. So far, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this product at ULTA beauty. I love the Origins brand!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Y

customer_reviews.title: Only facial mask I use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a facial routine I do about twice a week. After unclogging my pores using face/nose strips, I apply this mask... it really closes my pores and truly clears blemishes. I am happy with this product by origins. I was a bit skeptical about purchasing it but I fell in love and this is my 3rd bottle! And YES it does leave my face red after washing it off. Nothing too scary, it fades away after a while.
customer_reviews.author: cbr20

customer_reviews.title: great mask
customer_reviews.text: I've started using this weekly and it really brightens and evens out my skin tone while leaving my face feeling super soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It feels like a fake.
customer_reviews.text: 1.The package feels rough, like a monkey's butt. 2.Wash the face after use feel very hot face, suggest you can eat an ice cream at the same time. 3.After washing my face,I feel like a monkey's butt. I hope thie is normal.Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: yun

customer_reviews.title: I have used this mask before and happy chopper is not the same product
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product from "happy chopper" It is a fake. I have used this mask before and happy chopper is not the same product. the tube looks like it was tampered with and it is not the same product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: it's a solid charcoal face mask
customer_reviews.text: this product does all the things it's expected to. It creates a cooling sensation, creates a tightening sensation, and evens the tone of the skin. It is does take a smidge more effort than expected to fully remove and I wish the product had less ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as promised and more.
customer_reviews.text: Just the first time I used this at the end of my usual routine, I saw a change in darker spots all around my face. My sister also used it and she said it cleared every imperfection right up. As of right now I still feel my skin much more healthy and clear just having used this days ago. It's a bit pricey but I highly recommend​ it.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Essential must have!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years!!!! One Of the best face masks!!! Really brightens & smooths your skin!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this stuff. I have very sensitive skin and I can use this no problem

customer_reviews.text: I've only tried it once since buying it but definitely recommend this product you can see immediate difference.

customer_reviews.text: WaAaAaAaAy too expensive. Feels nice. Didn't do anything magical to clean my dirty pores. Would rather buy activated charcoal and make my own masks!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lives up to the hype. Not a peel off mask but cleanses the skin well.

customer_reviews.text: Ive tried several charcoal masks... this one is the best! Potent with good results. Love the tingle!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great for my sensitive skin, leaves my skin smooth and doesn't dry it out.

customer_reviews.text: Great for blackheads, but need to use it a few times a week to keep them away.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask! Comparable to glam glow! Did wonders for my skin!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives very soft touch to your skin but I didn't feel any improvement in blackheads

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried this type of mask before, but the reviews convinced me. Certainly, walking around with this mask on makes for great photographic opportunities for our fun-loving spouses, but my face has never felt as clean, nor looked so healthy. I use this twice a week, and wonder if I should use it more often! I am a fan!
customer_reviews.author: alaskafan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not certain yet if this is worth the price but it has helped clear up my skin. A little more time will tell I suppose

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of blackheads on my nose. With continuous use it helped clear them all!

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I got it. It makes me so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shui Chunyan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. It exfoliates beautifully. It leaves my skin moist and smooth. I use it weekly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeborahT

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved Origins products
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Origins products. This mask is smooth, applies easy and feels fantastic. Comes off with just water. I like to put it on and let it sit for 20-30 minutes then shower as it does take some scrubbing to get it all off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chrisney

customer_reviews.title: At home spa-quality treatment!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an at-home spa treatment! My skin LOVES this!
customer_reviews.author: A. Noakes

customer_reviews.title: Take a minute to pamper yourself...
customer_reviews.text: The Origins Charcoal Mask was originally recommended to me by my fiance. After having used so many masks out there, this is one of our favorites. It goes on smoothly and evenly, and it doesn't cause that slight burning/irritating feeling that many of the masks do (we both have pretty sensitive skin). The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that it dries out my face out a bit. A little quality lotion after removing the mask takes care of the dryness easily enough though. The Origins Charcoal Mask is great way to end a long, stressful week, and we will be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Hogie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I have clogged pores on my cheeks that look really bad so I decided to buy a face mask that had charcoal in it and I'm so glad I did cause it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin super smooth
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use this charcoal mask at night once a week. After washing it off, I can definitely feel the difference on my skin. My skin is super smooth and my acne scars are fading away slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Ningning

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this mask for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask for over a year. I have acne prone skin with large pores. The mask is quite effective; my skin tone is more even and skin texture is smoother/softer. The downside is that I experience a burning sensation each time I apply it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask, my skin is radiant after using it
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I did recommend it to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! I will never buy another face mask again. This stuff is so amazing. I got a single free sample of it with a Sephora purchase I made recently and after one use had to buy more. The next day my skin felt so soft and looked so even that I was able to skip using a primer before my foundation. It also cleared some acne that was surfacing. I am just as happy with continued use of this product. The only thing I would say is that although the directions say to leave on 30 min, I usually leave it for a few hours to notice the best effects.
customer_reviews.author: Marie066

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask. I have tried many different kinds from the very expensive Perricone cold plasma to the really cheap natural clay. This charcoal mask outperforms them all. It is very sticky and kind of a mess to use so I deducted one star. Still a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: PMD68

customer_reviews.title: healthy skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin! No redness and helps get rid of acne. I have shared this with my friends who also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Massey

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! Make sure you open your pores with a hot cloth first to get the best results. I have used it as a spot treatment overnight and it did not make the zit disappear but it also did not get bigger which for me is an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The mask arrived very quickly and exactly as decribed and promised. Also, the product works very well. It is gentle on the skin and pleasing to use. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It's like a thick lotion when you put it on
customer_reviews.text: I've actually used this product myself. It's like a thick lotion when you put it on. After 10 mins it's hard as a rock. However, after you wash it off, you can feel your skin being tingly and clean. I highly recommend. And though it's expensive, it does its job. I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: SantaMonicaCharizard

customer_reviews.title: Great Skin Cleanser - for men!
customer_reviews.text: Great pore cleanser. Using with OCM and chemical peel. Using daily with no problem. Can see it pulling the oil out of the pores with each use. Results have been positive. Much smoother skin in weeks.
customer_reviews.author: TaiChiDadTX

customer_reviews.title: Clean in a tube!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My face feels clean for hours after using it! I use every other day if not everyday. I know it says once a week, but everyone's skin is different. It feels kinda cool when it drys to. I would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Gray-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Did what it said, stung a bit but overall it was good. I find it a little drying so I use it once a week only.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mahdi

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't a huge difference, I could tell that the product worked but i don't know if it was more to do with me opening my pores and washing with hot water or it was because of the mask. Overall I thought that it was nice, it was worth the money spent on it 26 dollars on a charcoal mask of this callable is pretty good. again it was okay not the best product in the world not the worst.
customer_reviews.author: fatima mossolem

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice much difference after using. Did not remove all my blackheads and I didn't have many to start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it feels nice on my skin
customer_reviews.text: This face mask doesn't irritate my sensitive skin at all. I can't say I've noticed a HUGE difference in skin clarity, but it feels nice on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I find after using it that my blackheads are gone, my pores look much smaller, and my skin looks and feels softer, smoother, and refreshed. While I do not have acne-prone skin, I do have some blackheads on my nose and this works in removing them. Its really gentle as well and does not exasperate my rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar-Coma

customer_reviews.title: Magical Potion
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Using it as a traditional mask is incredibly refreshing, and I also add a dot here and there as overnight spot treatment to dry out growing pimples. It makes your skin feel soft and squeaky clean, and even a little bit tight (which I like). To be clear: this treatment is not a one-stop shop - you still need to use some sort of facial cleanser beforehand, and follow the same rules as you would without it (don't touch your face, pick scabs etc) but overall it's a great little tool. The bottle has lasted me six months of nightly spot treatments and weekly full-facials.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome, after washing off I can actually see the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome, after washing off I can actually see the pores on my nose looking cleaner (I am cursed with giant pores that are always clogged on my nose). Although my acne hasn't gone away or anything, this product just helps keep it in control and remove the dullness of my complexion. I have dry skin and use it 2-3 times a week without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Heck

customer_reviews.title: Feeling kind of "meh"
customer_reviews.text: This product has most definitely left my skin feeling wonderfully soft and smooth. It does not, however, clean deep in your pores just the surface. Product is decent enough, though not what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Asuna Yuuki

customer_reviews.title: I'll Never Use Anything Else!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite facial mask! My skin always feels smoother and cleaner whenever I use it. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too little or too much still don't clean as expected
customer_reviews.text: not strong enough, left on for 30 minutes and still wasn't dry
customer_reviews.author: Bettina Rippy

customer_reviews.title: I feel so nice and clean afterwards
customer_reviews.text: The only mask I use! I was introduced to this many years ago by a sales rep from a competing makeup counter (I won't name names). It's the only mask I buy now. I feel so nice and clean afterwards. And you get to feel all "metal" with your black face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and until now I can see a better skin face
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for a couple of days since I got it, and until now I can see a better skin face, so I keep using it and see how it works for a long period of time.. but until now I absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karlie

customer_reviews.title: Too legit too quit
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Origins products are legit for minimizing the appearances of my large pores! I've actually fell asleep with it on once, seemed to work better this way, just my bed had some black flakes here and there. Get it though, you won't regret it. For the price, at least you know you are buying something that works

customer_reviews.title: This product is nice, not a miracle mask
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice, not a miracle mask, but ok. I don't love some of the ingredients, but I am able to use it without my sensitive skin reacting.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mellon

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by the aesthetician who gave her a facial recently
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has sensitive skin. This product was recommended by the aesthetician who gave her a facial recently. The first time she used it we could tell a definite difference in the size of her pores. Now a couple of days later her skin looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!

customer_reviews.title: A good mask, but keep your expectations reasonable...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask and it leaves your skin looking recharged and clean, but it's not a miracle worker. Some of the reviews I read made it sounds like the fountain of youth, so try to keep your expectations reasonable and you won't be disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Cheaper than stores
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Cheaper than stores! My skin looks and feels better after just a couple of weeks.

customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite masks. Really feel soft and smooth day after.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have dry skin. This seems to be for those on the oily side.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask for your at-home spa
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely fantastic beauty product. Your skin feels so smoothe after using it. The downside of this product is that it can dry your skin, so make sure to properly moisturize afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Buenning

customer_reviews.title: this product is hard on sensitive skin but it does so well on helping you look your best, be sure to have cleanser
customer_reviews.text: make sure you start about once a week, this product is hard on sensitive skin but it does so well on helping you look your best, be sure to have cleanser, toner and cotton pads on hand for the whole ritual, if you're not sure how to take care of your skin, you better get to know a good gay honey. after you know about how frequently your skin can take a mask do it as often or a infrequent as works for you, we are all different. remember you are smashing and beautiful and the sexiest thing to anyone with a brain is confidence and sincerity.
customer_reviews.author: GMJ

customer_reviews.title: My face felt great after using it and it cleared up some of ...
customer_reviews.text: eh for as expensive as this is it's not really that impressive. My face felt great after using it and it cleared up some of my acne though. it is a bit drying.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for $35
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a peel off mask to remove blackheads. Tube was not sealed under cap, does not give instructions on how long to leave on etc. Mask does not peel off, need to use a wash cloth to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: smaller package same price
customer_reviews.text: This item is smaller for the same price. I used to get 4.2oz. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask because it works. it does get the impurities out like no other. that said, you actually have to deal with all the black heads and white heads that this mask brings out to the surface. definitely recommend for combination and oily skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Dina K

customer_reviews.title: I bought the largest size and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought the largest size and I'm glad I did. I don't have acne, but I do have large pores on nose and cheeks that tend to get clogged up. On weekend mornings I'll put a 2% BHA liquid on and then layer this over it. I let the mask dry completely then wash off with cool water and moisturize. I get results from this that I have never achieved with any pore strip. The blackheads on my nose are significantly reduced for a few days, although as we all know they simply fill back up. When I run out I'll be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipped on time
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice, I like using it once a week to really clean my face, I clean my make-up off every day, but this is nice to really clean your face.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!  Not the real product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Not the real product!!!! This is not anything like the true oirgins charcoal mask. I've used the oirgins active charcoal mask for years. This tube I ordered didn't smell the same and made me break out. Very bad experience. Don't order from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lightner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Can always rely on this product to clear any blemishes & acne scarring. Deeply cleanses my face, getting all the filth out of my pores. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: maofla

customer_reviews.title: But as a Christmas gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: He complains that it makes his face break out but I told him that’s what it supposed to do it supposed to bring out all of the junk and it does a good job of it once I explain that he uses it more!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I use this 2-3 times a week after cleanser and always see results. It reduces a lot of irritation in acne and is easy to wash off after application.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Monet

customer_reviews.title: The Only Mask I Use!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask for several years. My skin is sensitive. This mask doesn't dry my skin or irritate it in any way. I like the way it deep cleans my skin. You don't have to use a lot of it at one time. It's easy to use-------put it on, let it dry, take it off and you are done.
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask..
customer_reviews.text: Very good mask. I have not really noticed blackheads coming out, but my skin does look a lot smoother, healthier and I have less break-outs. After I use this mask my skin looks like I just received a facial. I will definitely purchase this again..
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, shrinks pores, I like to use it after a shave. Make sure it dries well so you can get the full benefits

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and she said it is amazing and works wonderfully!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! It’s easy to use and it works. Makes your face feel great. Delivery was earlier than promised - a very good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cleaning pores gently. Has no sand or rough ingredients.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this. I have seen an improvement in my face. I do steam my face for about 15 min before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps clean my skin--I use it once a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps clean my skin--I use it once a week. I have very delicate and sensitive skin, though, and it definitely does make my skin dry. I take the mask of instantly when it dries as to avoid the itch.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it clears your skin out and you look so fresh and clean the next day. It's like getting a facial at home for a fraction of the cost. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff. Cleans my pores and makes them a little less visible.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mask
customer_reviews.text: This takes a few minutes to get used to, it cleared all my pores, crazy! It works one of the best I have ever used, good price excellent product cant go wrong,
customer_reviews.author: Seriously C

product_meta.title: ORIGINS Clear Improvement Active Charcoal Mask to Clear Pores, 3.4 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: When environmental toxins, dirt and debris get under your skin, its waste-filtering system gets jammed, pores get clogged, skin looks cloudy. Nature's complexion clean-up crew gets to the bottom of skins overcast condition and clears the way for it to act its best. HOW TO USE: Once a week or as often as needed, open pores with warm, moist towel and layer mask on. Allow to dry, rinse well. Clear Improvement™ is for all skin types.
feature_bullets: Nature's complexion clean-up crew clears the way for skin to act its best
Bamboo Charcoal acts like a magnet to draw out deep-dwelling pore-cloggers
White China Clay absorbs environmental toxins
Lecithin dissolves impurities and makes skin look clear and fell perfectly pure
Watch your skin shake off the shroud of dullness and take on a new clarity
